page.title: 05WEST BERGHOLT
page.content: West Bergholt is a small village situated two miles to the north west of Colchester. The village could be described as quiet or even sleepy. The village has grown considerably over the last ten to twenty years. This has been due almost entirely to the fact that the village has excellent access to the nearby Colchester railway station. Commuters can reach the station in five minutes and regular services to London's Liverpool St. Station means that commuters can be in the City in one hour. As well as the easy acces to the train services the main A12 to London is immediately on the doorstep of the village.
